This has **bold** text.

This has *italic* text.

This has ~~strikethrough~~ text.

This has `inline code` in it.

This has **bold and *nested italic*** together.

This has ***bold italic*** text.

Here is a [link](https://example.com) in text.

Here is [another link](https://example.com/path?q=1) with a longer URL.
